5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Umm ‘Atiyyah said:“The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) commanded us to bring them (the women) out on the day of Fitr and the day of Nahr.” Umm ‘Atiyyah said: “We said: ‘What if one of them does not have an outer covering?’ He said: ‘Let her sister share her own outer covering with her.’”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي خُرُوجِ النِّسَاءِ فِي الْعِيدَيْنِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning women going out on the two ‘Eid
